siteDescription: software engineer and consultant specializing in frontend/ui development.
headline: creative developer
bio:
Michael Ciccarelli is a seasoned software engineer with a focus on front-end/UI, creating responsive, visually engaging web apps with smooth motion and animation for a dynamic user experience.

Based in Brooklyn, he runs a independent software consultancy, working with a range of clients—from startups to enterprise—building publishing platforms, e-commerce sites, and B2B SaaS solutions.
